      void tick()
      Updates the map by incrementing a timer for the red enemy's movement and interacting with the map environment Based on the AI, the red enemy will make a movement every second, which will update its position and direction

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Updates the map by incrementing a timer for the red enemy's movement and interacting with the map environment Based on the AI, the red enemy will make a movement every second, which will update its position and direction
